item.title: Build a Simple Linux Environment with Docker
item.description: Make a Linux test environment in Docker Apple’s macOS is a Unix-like system, based on BSD, and as such is very similar to Linux.

item.title: Build a Webserver in Container Using Python and Updog
item.description: Build a webserver in a container Create a brand new debian container which exposes port 9090 on the local machine
